title: MCP Inspector
subtitle: Interactive testing and debugging interface for MCP servers
noServerSelectedDesc: Please select an MCP server from the dropdown above to start inspecting its capabilities and testing its functionality.
connectToStart: Connect to MCP server to start inspecting
selectServerDesc: Please select a server to inspect

pingComponent.title: Server Connectivity Test
pingComponent.noPingHistory: No ping history yet. Click "Ping Server" to test connectivity.
pingComponent.aboutPingDescription: The ping test checks if the MCP server is responsive. It first tries the standard "ping" method, and if that's not available, falls back to testing with "tools/list" to verify the server is reachable. Response times help assess server performance.

promptsComponent.title: Prompts
promptsComponent.promptsNotSupportedDesc: This MCP server doesn't support prompts.
promptsComponent.clickLoadPrompts: Click "Load Prompts" to fetch available prompts from the MCP server.
promptsComponent.noPromptsFound: No prompts found on MCP server
promptsComponent.selectPrompt: Select a prompt to view its result
promptsComponent.clickGetPrompt: Click "Get Prompt" to retrieve the result for "{{promptName}}"
promptsComponent.aboutPromptsDesc: Prompts are reusable templates that can generate messages for AI conversations. They can accept arguments to customize the generated content and help maintain consistent interactions across different contexts.
promptsComponent.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

resourcesComponent.resourcesNotSupportedDesc: This MCP server doesn't support resources.
resourcesComponent.clickLoadResources: Click "Load Resources" to fetch available resources from the MCP server.
resourcesComponent.selectResource: Select a resource to view its content
resourcesComponent.clickRead: Click "Read" to load the content of "{{resourceName}}"
resourcesComponent.aboutResourcesDesc: Resources provide access to data that the MCP server can read. This includes files, web content, databases, or any other data sources. You can subscribe to resources to receive notifications when they change.
resourcesComponent.noResourcesFound: No resources found on MCP server
resourcesComponent.fetchResourcesError: Failed to fetch resources from MCP server
resourcesComponent.fetchTemplatesError: Failed to fetch resource templates from MCP server
resourcesComponent.noResourceTemplatesFound: No resource templates found on MCP server

toolsComponent.title: Tools Testing
toolsComponent.subtitle: Test and debug available tools
toolsComponent.toolsNotSupportedDesc: This MCP server does not support the tools capability.
toolsComponent.toolsNotSupportedWarning: Tools capability not available on this server
toolsComponent.clickListTools: Click "List Tools" to load available tools
toolsComponent.noExecutions: No executions yet. Select a tool and execute it to see results.
toolsComponent.invalidJsonDescription: Please check your JSON syntax and try again.
